title: Real-World Financial Decision-Making Simulation: Accounting Ethics and Crisis Management

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational accounting principles and understanding of financial systems
context.additional_context: A course providing hands-on financial decision-making experiences in a simulation environment based on real corporate financial data

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate the ability to prepare financial reports according to accounting policies across diverse financial scenarios.
Learners can apply professional judgment criteria to make appropriate decisions in accounting ethics dilemmas.
Learners can develop coordination and collaboration strategies among stakeholders during corporate crises.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
